content.body: I am looking for a proper place to discuss various options that remain available in a post-3P-cookie world (related to sign-in management, bounce tracking, FedCM, ...). I have written a short summary of points that I would like to hear expert opinions on; where should I post that? Here? FedCM github issues? Some other github repo? I am not seeking clarification regarding one particular technology, but rather a more high-level overview of options and directions browser are heading to.
Ondřej Žára: some privacycg repo prolly

> <@annevk:matrix.org> Ondřej Žára: some privacycg repo prolly

Thanks! Will have a look.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:matrix.org

content.body: keithamus: I learned from Jeffrey Yasskin about https://docs.github.com/en/communities/moderating-comments-and-conversations/managing-reported-content-in-your-organizations-repository. Is there any way that you can configure that for an entire organization and manage for an entire organization?

content.body: keithamus: I was also thinking of making some small set of people moderators, but it seems moderators cannot be entrusted to delete issues so I'm not quite sure what the point would be

content.body: I’ve been talking with the communities team about the WhatWG repos and getting better moderation tools. I can’t make any promises nor make any predictions on timelines but rest assured it’s being discussed!
